thread.title: L-L Football Week 6: Manheim Township set to take on Cedar Crest
thread.title_full: L-L Football Week 6: Manheim Township set to take on Cedar Crest

author: ED GRUVER | Sports Writer
title: L-L Football Week 6: Manheim Township set to take on Cedar Crest
text:
Comments CHRIS KNIGHT 
Blue Streaks QB Erik Benjamin leads one of the most prolific offenses in the L-L League. (Photo/Chris Knight) 
Cedar Crest (1-1 Section One, 2-3 overall) at Manheim Township (2-0 Section One, 4-1 overall): The Blue Streaks are on a red-hot streak, outscoring opponents the last three weeks by an average score of 47-17. 
Erik Benjamin has thrown for 16 TDs against just 2 interceptions and owns a QB rating of 127. Matt Van Gorden paces the ground game while receivers John Stutz, Riley MacDonald and Dillon Oâ€™Connor have combined for 49 catches. 
MacDonald and Stutz are among the key contributors on the Township defense as well. MacDonald has a team-high 2.5 sacks and Stutz a team-leading 3 interceptions. Tackle leaders Grayson Sallade and Hogan Glick have combined for 65 stops. 
QB Steve Roda helps fuel the Falcon offense, as does Justice Belleman, who ranks as one of the top rushers in Section One. 
Crest's defense, which ranks among the best statistically in Section One, looks to provide a test for a Township attack that is among the best in the L-L. 
The Streaks have been dominant in the series, posting four shutouts over the last decade. More Headlines
